tasks.label: Toggle Hidden Files
tasks.command: sed -i '' 's/"\.vscode": true/"\.vscode": false/g; s/"\.github": true/"\.github": false/g; s/"\.agent": true/"\.agent": false/g' .vscode/settings.json || sed -i '' 's/"\.vscode": false/"\.vscode": true/g; s/"\.github": false/"\.github": true/g; s/"\.agent": false/"\.agent": true/g' .vscode/settings.json
